curl -X POST https://api.mamboschools.com/api.php -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{
    "action": "add",
    "post_hash": "hash123",
    "post_date": "2023-10-01 12:00:00",
    "post_title": "Sample Title",
    "post_data": "Sample data",
    "post_src": "Sample source",
    "post_user": "@SchoolName"
}'

curl -X POST https://api.mamboschools.com/api.php -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{
    "action": "modify",
    "id": 1,
    "post_hash": "hash123",
    "post_date": "2023-10-01 12:00:00",
    "post_title": "Updated Title",
    "post_data": "Updated data",
    "post_src": "Updated source",
    "post_user": "@SchoolName"
}'
